book.author: Barrett, Daniel J.
book.title: Linux Pocket Guide: Essential Commands
book.description: A pocket guide for using Linux.

book.author: Lutz, Mark
book.title: Python Pocket Reference: Python In Your Pocket
book.description: A pocket guide for using Python.

book.author: Lutz, Mark
book.title: Learning Python
book.description: A comprehensive, in-depth introduction to the core Python language.

book.author: McKinney, Wes
book.title: Python for Data Analysis: Data Wrangling with Pandas, NumPy, and IPython
book.description: This book is concerned with the nuts and bolts of manipulating, processing, cleaning, and crunching data in Python.

book.author: Beazley, David
book.title: Python Cookbook
book.description: This book is aimed at more experienced Python programmers who are looking to deepen their understanding of the language and modern programming idioms. Much of the material focuses on some of the more advanced techniques used by libraries, frameworks, and applications.

book.author: Bader, Dan
book.title: Python Tricks: A Buffet of Awesome Python Features
book.description: Python best practices and the power of beautiful and Pythonic code with simple examples and a step-by-step narrative.

book.author: Matthes, Eric
book.title: Python Crash Course: A Hands-On, Project-Based Introduction to Programming
book.description: A fast-paced, no-nonsense guide to programming in Python.

book.author: Stroustrup, Bjarne
book.title: The C++ Programming Language
book.description: Presents the C++11 language, standard library, and key design techniques as an integrated whole.

book.author: Meyers, Scott
book.title: Effective Modern C++: 42 Specific Ways to Improve Your Use of C++11 and C++14
book.description: Describes the effective application of C++11 and C++14.

book.author: O'Brien, Tim
book.title: Eloquent JavaScript: A Modern Introduction to Programming
book.description: Dives deep into the JavaScript language to show you how to write beautiful, effective code.

book.author: Bloch, Joshua
book.title: Effective Java
book.description: Covers language and library features added in Java 7, 8, and 9, including the functional programming constructs that were added to its object-oriented roots.

book.author: Goetz, Brian
book.title: Java Concurrency in Practice
book.description: Arms readers with both the theoretical underpinnings and concrete techniques for building reliable, scalable, maintainable concurrent applications.

book.author: Eckel, Bruce
book.title: Thinking in Java
book.description: The classic object-oriented introduction for beginners and experts alike.

book.author: McManus, Sean
book.title: Mission Python
book.description: Launch into coding with Mission Python, a space-themed guide to building a complete computer game in Python.

book.author: Resig, John
book.title: Secrets of the JavaScript Ninja
book.description: Uses practical examples to clearly illustrate each core JavaScript concept and technique.
